entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 25.
